page.title: 10Employment in Ilkeston
page.content: In Ilkeston 90.5% of the men have full time employment, and 18% of the women have full time employment. 53% of women have part-time jobs. 85% of people take within half an hour to get to work so they must work in the Derbyshire area. 78% say they enjoy their work (but some probably don't), and 52% are wage earners. 14% have professional posts and 40% manufacture 13% are retail. Retail is working in shops, pubs, etc. 14% are domestic, cleaning ladies, dinner ladies, etc. 30% clerical and 11% service industry. Stanton and Staveley is a factory with most employment for men, and the garment and textile business has most employment for women. Factories like Stanton and Staveley are heavy industry, and machining etc. are all light industry. Stanton make things like lamp posts and reinforced pipes.
